```{r, echo=FALSE}
require(ncovr)
require(leafletCN)
# Sys.setlocale('LC_CTYPE', 'Chinese')
ncov <- get_ncov()
ncov$area$date <- as.character(as.Date(ncovr:::conv_time(ncov$area$updateTime)))
ncov$area <- ncov$area[!duplicated(paste(ncov$area$provinceName, ncov$area$date)), ]
x <- ncov$area[ncov$area$date == "2020-01-22", 2:6]

method <- "province"

if(method == 'city'){
  x_city <- dplyr::bind_rows(ncov$area$cities)
  if (nrow(x_city) != 0) 
    x_city <- x_city[, 1:5]
  x_area <- x
  names(x_area)[1] <- "cityName"
  x <- rbind(x_city, x_area)
  cities <- leafletCN::regionNames(mapName = "city")
  x <- x[x$cityName %in% cities, ]
}
prefix <- switch(method, "province" = "省", "city" = "市")
knitr::kable(x, format = "html", caption = paste0("2020-01-22 疫情数据表(", prefix, ")"), row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("名称", "确诊", "疑似", "治愈", "死亡"))
```
